Both men in the photo are descendants of Nagakura Shinpachi and
involved in the award winning TV Documentary and book
You may insert the address into http://www.nifty.com/globalgate to
get a "translation". There is a mention of Nagakura's black haori.

ronin

the photo is of a shrine believed to have been frequented by Okita
Souji. Again you'll have to try to make heads or tails of the nifty
translation or a fan here can try to translate

messages.messageBody:
sorry to bug the list again

please see http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com
note the book cover in the lower left hand corner
does it look like a caricature of an aged former captain of the
Shinsengumi?

XD
